name: Behacked
description:
Would it work if a roguelike(ish) game was happening on top of a match three of a kind game board? Well, time to find out!

So Behacked is a match three type score attack game where you also battle against enemies by literally sweeping the floor from beneath them. Every few kills or so your character levels up and you get to pick a new skill to add to your arsenal. Pick skills to achieve some interesting and possible game breaking combos and see how far you can make it on the online leaderboards.

There is also an Android build if you dare side load it... 🤖
https://games.sahaqiel.com/Behacked.apk

Made for #7DRL 2022 in a week using:

- Unity 2021.2 for 🍎  silicon (yay!)
- JetBrains Rider ❤️
- Garageband & Audacity
